title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6020 - Basic Course For Police Officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6020 - Basic Course For Police Officers

State Regulations
§ 6020.1 - Definitions
§ 6020.2 - Statement of purpose
§ 6020.3 - Minimum standards
§ 6020.4 - Requirements for approval of a basic course
§ 6020.5 - Requirements for conducting a basic course
§ 6020.6 - Requirements for issuance of a certificate of completion
§ 6020.7 - Time limitations for completion of the basic course for police officers
§ 6020.8 - Issuance of equivalency certificates
§ 6020.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6020

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 35, §§ 840, 842

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
